question: Choose the correct form of the verb: She ___ to the store every Saturday.
Select the appropriate preposition: They arrived ___ the airport on time.
Choose the correct pronoun: Everyone should bring ___ own lunch.
Select the proper adjective: She has a very ___ personality.
Choose the correct conjunction: I wanted to go, ___ I was too tired.
Select the appropriate article: She adopted ___ cat from the shelter.
Choose the correct tense: By next year, he ___ his degree.
Select the correct form: If I ___ you, I would apologize.
Choose the correct modal verb: You ___ finish your homework before playing.
Select the proper adverb: She sings ___ in the choir.
